body:
Features and Enhancements

Population Files
  • Manage Population Files
    • View and manage population files in the project via the My Population Files tile on the right side of the home page.
    • Show Share Population Files to view population files created by anyone in the project.
    • Population Files can be sorted by Name, Recently Used, Frequently Used, Created by, or Expires.
Competitive Dashboard
  • Minimum Market Penetration
    • Market penetration threshold can be set between 0% and 25% instead of limiting to 10%.
